Package objets

Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
objets.Sphere
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjetScene
public class Sphere extends Object implements IObjetScene
The `Sphere` class represents a 3D spherical object in a scene.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sphere(Point origine, double ray)
    Constructs a sphere with the specified origin and radius.

      Computes the intersection of a ray with the sphere.
      Specified by:
      intersection in interface IObjetScene
      Parameters:
      lookFrom - The starting point of the ray.
      d - The direction vector of the ray.
      Returns:

      The normal vector at a given point on the surface of the sphere.
      Specified by:
